TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Layout extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: A base class that manages text layout in visual elements on the screen.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: protected Layout (Java.Lang.ICharSequence? text, Android.Text.TextPaint? paint, int width, Android.Text.Layout.Alignment? align, float spacingMult, float spacingAdd);

.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Java.Lang.ICharSequence text, class Android.Text.TextPaint paint, int32 width, class Android.Text.Layout/Alignment align, float32 spacingMult, float32 spacingAdd) cil managed
new Android.Text.Layout : Java.Lang.ICharSequence * Android.Text.TextPaint * int * Android.Text.Layout.Alignment * single * single -> Android.Text.Layout
MemberSignature.Usage: new Android.Text.Layout (text, paint, width, align, spacingMult, spacingAdd)

Docs.param: the default paint for the layout. Styles can override various attributes of the paint.
the wrapping width for the text.
whether to left, right, or center the text. Styles can override the alignment.
factor by which to scale the font size to get the default line spacing
amount to add to the default line spacing
Docs.summary: Subclasses of Layout use this constructor to set the display text, width, and other standard properties.

format.a: Java documentation for android.text.Layout.Layout(java.lang.CharSequence, android.text.TextPaint, int, android.text.Alignment, float, float).
